attributes.description: This shows the process of how the frozen meal acquires the beef in the meal.
attributes.title: Findus' Frozen "Beef" Lasagne

attributes.description: Draap is Cyprus based but their warehouse where the meat from Romania is shipped is located in the Netherlands
attributes.title: Draap Trader

attributes.description: Findus meals are then available to be bought in grocery stores. A major store in the U.K. is Tesco
attributes.title: Tesco
Draap Warehouse
attributes.description: Draap contends they ordered horse from Romania and then shipped boxes labeled horse to Spanghero

attributes.title: Spanghero
attributes.description: Spanghero is a meat processing company.

attributes.title: Tavola
attributes.description: Factory where the frozen meals were created. Comigel uses the factory here to create the meals. This factory makes the beef lasagne meal after getting meat labeled as beef from Spanghero.

attributes.title: Comigel
attributes.description: Creates frozen meals for different companies. Findus uses Comigel for their beef lasagne meal. Comigel is a 3rd party supplier of frozen meals

attributes.title: Findus
attributes.description: Findus is a popular brand of frozen meals in Europe

attributes.title: Tesco
attributes.description: A major chain of grocery stores in Ireland. They stocked Findus' frozen beef lasagne meal

attributes.title: Findus  to Comigel
attributes.description: Findus asks Comigel for the Beef Lasagne meals.

attributes.title: Spanghero  to Trader
attributes.description: Spanghero contacts their trader in Cyprus for the meat. It is still yet to be known whether Spanghero asked for horsemeat and then relabeled it as beef, or whether they asked for beef and receiver horsemeat purposely mislabeled as beef.

attributes.title: Comigel to Spanghero
attributes.description: Comigel asks Spanghero for the beef for their meals

attributes.title: Draap Trader to Slaughterhouse
attributes.description: The trader contacts the Romania slaughterhouses for the order of either horse or meat.

attributes.title: Slaughterhouse to Draap Warehouse
attributes.description: Romanian slaughterhouse ships horse labeled as horse to Draap who has a warehouse in the Netherlands

attributes.title: Draap Warehouse to Spanghero
attributes.description: Draap then either sends horsemeat labeled as beef to Spanghero, or sends horsemeat labeled as horse meat
Spanghero either sends beef already mislabeled as horsemeat to the Comigel's factory Tavola, or they relabel the horsemeat as beef and send it to the factory
attributes.title: Spanghero  to Tavola
Tavola to Tesco
attributes.description: Findus meals are then available to be bought in grocery stores. A major store in the U.K. is Tesco

attributes.title: Tavola to Tesco
attributes.description: Findus meals are then available to be bought in grocery stores. A major store in the U.K. is Tesco
